document_data.name: Stersen's Paddock
document_data.services: [[Horse]]s, for purchase or rent; harnesses and saddles
document_data.mainbody: '''Stersen's Paddock''' was the only corral and equestrian shop in [[Archenbridge]] as of [[1369 DR]]. It was run by a [[horse]] trader named [[Stersen]]. His services included the purchasing or hiring of horses, as well as the sale of harnesses and saddles.
